Ipopt
-----

Description:
   Ipopt (Interior Point OPTimizer, pronounced eye-pea-Opt) is a software package for large-scale nonlinear optimization.

Website:
   `https://projects.coin-or.org/Ipopt <https://projects.coin-or.org/Ipopt>`__ 

Reference:
   \A. WÃ¤chter and L. T. Biegler, On the Implementation of a Primal-Dual Interior Point Filter Line Search Algorithm for Large-Scale Nonlinear Pogramming, Mathematical Programming 106(1), pp. 25-57, 2006
